Text.Language: God has created the angels and the principalities in Heaven to praise and glorify Him and do His will. Satan was one of the principalities of heaven but when he overstepped his boundaries and rejected the truth, he fell from his leadership position and from heaven to earth where he thought he would have no master. Hence, God created Adam to punish him, and made Adam ruler of the earth and what is upon it. When Satan witnessed this, he became jealous and envied manâ€™s leadership and the pleasures of paradise. He realized that, with the will of God, Adam would reach the heavenly status that he and his demons will not be able to achieve. Therefore, he trapped Adam and made him to fall. Adam was no longer the ruler of the earth but fell under Satanâ€™s leadership. The devil entered into the serpent and spoke to Eve, so she sinned, and so did her husband. And both lost their roles as rulers of the earth and became, along with their offspring, subservient to Satan. Satan now boasts of his evil council and claims victory over the Lord.

When He gave the disciples His Holy body and Blood and told them that His blood will be shed to save the world, Satan could see His divinity especially after the long speech He gave to the disciples. In this speech, He showed them His divinity and that He is a true God from a true God equal to the Father in principle and that He is in the Father and the Father is in Him and that He is one with the Father and the Holy Spirit.
